_comment: See README.md for full documentation. The 'confluence' and 'jira' sections are optional.
_self_note: Optional: Set 'self' to your GitHub username for IC self-tracking features (goals, reflections, self-assessment)
_repos_note: repos is optional - leave empty [] to search all org repos

confluence._note: Remove this entire 'confluence' section if not using Confluence

jira._note: Remove this entire 'jira' section if not using Jira planning tools

_jira_note: story_point_field and epic_link_field vary by Jira instance - check your Jira admin settings
_teams_note: Use 'teams' for multi-team setup OR 'team_members' for single team (legacy format). Cannot use both.
_legacy_format_note: Alternative: use 'team_members' for single team (comment out 'teams' above)
_atlassian_note: Use 'N/A' for atlassian_account_id if not using Confluence/Jira
